meanings.sent1: The old paper yellowed with age.
meanings.sent2: The banana yellowed as it ripened.
meanings.sent3: The sun yellowed the daffodils in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her smile yellowed the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves yellowed beautifully before falling.

meanings.sent1: The yellowed pages of the book showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The yellowed walls of the house looked like cheese.
meanings.sent4: The yellowed sky at sunset painted a serene picture.
meanings.sent5: The yellowed teeth of the old dog added character to his face.
